meanings.sent1: The semiofficial statement was not from the government.
meanings.sent2: The semiofficial logo was used on the event posters.
meanings.sent3: The semiofficial dress code for the party was pajamas.
meanings.sent4: Her semiofficial role as the team motivator was crucial.
meanings.sent5: The semiofficial badge granted access to restricted areas.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an organization or activity that is not officially recognized.
meanings.sent1: The semiofficial club met in the basement.
meanings.sent2: The semiofficial event was not listed on the school calendar.
meanings.sent3: The semiofficial handshake involved a secret signal.
meanings.sent4: Her semiofficial title was 'Queen of the Unseen'.
meanings.sent5: The semiofficial newsletter shared insider information.
